title: Systems Designer, Games Studio
overview: The Systems Designer, Games Studio position at Netflix involves working closely with a core team to rapidly prototype and iterate towards a new game vision, designing meta-systems to maximize player retention and virality, and creating features that foster a community of sharing and virality, among other responsibilities.
description:
Netflix is building a new internal game studio to incubate and build a new class of hilarious, social party video games.

The Systems Designer will work closely with a new cross-discipline core team to rapidly prototype and iterate towards a new game vision, building confidence on a great game prototype to eventually bring to full production and make available to Netflix members.

In addition to finding the fun, a successful candidate will also be able to design meta-systems that maximize player retention and virality. We strive to make amazing games that are not only fun to play but also drive players to keep coming back and share the experience with their friends and family. Those who bias towards action and are energized by the learning that comes with bold experimentation at an agile pace. extras.title: Responsibilities
content: Game Progression: Design and map out game progression from a systems perspective that is built to enhance player retentionBalance: Work on the overall pacing and balance of our games
Community: Design features that allow players to connect with each other and foster a community of sharing and virality
Find-the-fun: Design, prototype, and test exciting new experiences in the social party space. This includes both paper tests and digital prototypes
Documentation: Provide clear feature documentation, complete with diagrams and analyses, backed up with numbers, wireframes and prototypes, as needed

Collaboration: Work with teammates by providing and receiving creative/team feedback, plusâ€™ing othersâ€™ creative contributions, and providing clear creative goals with intentionally desired outcomes

extras.title: Requirements
content: 3+ years experience as a game designer shipping multiple large-scale products
Experience designing live ops meta-game features that drive player retention and virality
Experience designing and mapping out game progression systems
Exceptional communication and cross-discipline collaboration skills
Passion for making video games, especially in a rapid, focused, smaller form vs multi-year investments

extras.title: Bonus Skills
content: Familiar with visual design tools such as Playmaker or Blueprint
Familiarity with video and board games that are in the social party space
Able to use art tools needed to share ideas such as Adobe CC
Familiarity with flowcharting tools such as Miro and Figma
Writing skills and comedy chops are always a plus
